Name: Warbrush
About the game: Invite up to 4 players Optional A.I. for solo players Controller support Remappable keyboard control 5 PvP maps, 2 Co-op maps, 40 handcrafted challenge levels 5 types of tanks for different playstyles Seamless edge warping Destructible terrain for added tactical play Richochetting bullet allowing for clutch parries Taunts GAME MODES PVP MAPS Combat : This mode is won either by defeating your opponents or by covering a large portion of the canvas with your paint Night Maze : Splash your paint to reveal your surroundings as you navigate through the invisible maze Ocean Mist : When you're tired of looking at dry paint, join this map for a refreshing watercolor experience Desert : Weave through rolling tumbleweeds to take down your enemy in the sandstorm Hanabi : Glide through the night sky while dropping some fireworks! CO-OP MAPS Torch Light : Zombies approach under the shroud of shadows. Keep the torches lit to mark your safe zones. Arcade : Defend against waves of invading Greys that are overtaking the map by monochrome CHALLENGE MODE 40 challenging levels for players looking for more handcrafted and challenging content. TANKS RIFLE : Sharpshooter tank. In Arcade mode, Rifle has the highest damage and can reliably take down targets SPLASH : Shotgun tank. Powerful up close but slow rotation speed leaves its flank vulnerable GRENADE : Mid-range AOE attacker. Its grenade can be guided by the tank's facing direction, powerful in the hand of an expert. BOUNCER : Bouncer bullets will bounce towards the nearest enemy. Try to score a triple kill when enemies are clustered up SEEKER : Fast-moving with no recoil, for players that want to stay on the move. Circle-in like a shark and assassinate the enemy with homing missiles
Meta Title: Warbrush: Oct 21, 2019, Clearline and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Warbrush? Check out the release date (Oct 21, 2019), developer insights from Clearline, and a complete game summary.
